data.name: GoalsDefined
data.value: Have the goals of the system been defined? How exactly?

data.name: ProblemsDefined
data.value: Have the problems been defined? How exactly?

data.name: BenefitsDefined
data.value: Have the benefits been defined? How exactly?

data.name: BasicShareholdersDefined
data.value: Have the basic shareholders been defined? How exhaustive?

data.name: AdditionalShareholdersDefined
data.value: Have additional shareholders been defined? How exhaustive?

data.name: ExternalShareholdersDefined
data.value: Are external shareholders defined? How exhaustive?

data.name: CoreUsersDetermined
data.value: Have the core users been determined? How exhaustive?

data.name: AdditionalUsersIdentified
data.value: Have additional users been identified? How exhaustive?

data.name: UserTasksSpecified
data.value: Have user tasks been specified? How exactly?

data.name: RequiredFunctionsDefined
data.value: Have all the required functions been defined? How exhaustive?

data.name: FeatureDescriptionsComplete
data.value: Does each feature have a complete description? How exhaustive?

data.name: FeaturesAssignedToUsers
data.value: Have the features been properly assigned to users?

data.name: InputsDefined
data.value: Have inputs been defined? How precisely?

data.name: OutputDefined
data.value: Is the output defined? How precisely?

data.name: StoredDataDefined
data.value: Is stored data defined? How precisely?

data.name: DataProcessingMethodsDefined
data.value: Are the methods of data processing defined? How precisely?

data.name: CoreProcessesDefined
data.value: Have the core processes been defined? How exactly?

data.name: BasicOperationsDefined
data.value: Are basic operations defined? In how much detail?

data.name: SystemArchitectureSpecified
data.value: Is the system architecture specified? In how much detail?

data.name: OperatingEnvironmentSpecified
data.value: Is the operating environment of the system specified? How precisely?

data.name: InteroperableSystemsDefined
data.value: Are there any other interoperable systems? How exhaustive?

data.name: UserInteractionDefined
data.value: Is there a way to interact with the user? How precisely?

data.name: UserInterfaceExampleShown
data.value: Is the user interface example shown? In how much detail?

data.name: InterfacesToOtherSystemsDefined
data.value: Are there any interfaces to other systems? How precisely?

data.name: ProcessingTimeRequirements
data.value: Are there requirements for processing time?

data.name: ResponseTimeRequirements
data.value: Are there any requirements for response time?

data.name: ParallelProcessesIdentified
data.value: Have potentially parallel processes been identified?

data.name: ParallelOperationsIdentified
data.value: Have potentially parallel operations been identified?

data.name: ConcurrentUsersEstimated
data.value: Has the number of users using the system at the same time been estimated?

data.name: TransactionsPerUnitTimeEstimated
data.value: Have you estimated the number of transactions per unit of time?

data.name: InitialRecordsEstimated
data.value: Has the initial number of records (files) been estimated?

data.name: IncreaseInRecordsEstimated
data.value: Has the increase in records (files) of data been estimated?

data.name: DataVolumeEstimated
data.value: Has the volume of data been estimated?

data.name: DataArchivingPlanned
data.value: Is data archiving planned?

data.name: OptimalEquipmentRequirementsDetermined
data.value: Have the optimal requirements for the equipment been determined?

data.name: MinimumHardwareRequirements
data.value: Are there minimum requirements for the hardware?

data.name: PerformanceLossUnderSuboptimalConditions
data.value: Has the permissible loss of performance under suboptimal conditions been determined?

data.name: OptimalSoftwareRequirementsDetermined
data.value: Have the optimal requirements for the software been determined?

data.name: MinimumSoftwareRequirements
data.value: Are there minimum requirements for the software?

data.name: MaximumUsersEstimated
data.value: Has the maximum number of users been estimated?

data.name: MaximumTransactionsPerUnitTimeEstimated
data.value: Has the maximum number of transactions per unit of time been estimated?

data.name: SystemExpansionPlanned
data.value: Is it planned to expand the system when the maximum values are exceeded?

data.name: MaximumRecordsEstimated
data.value: Has the maximum number of records (files) been estimated?

data.name: MaximumDataVolumeEstimated
data.value: Has the maximum data volume been estimated?

data.name: EmergencySituationsDefined
data.value: Are there any emergency situations?

data.name: EmergencyResponsesDefined
data.value: Have emergency responses been defined?

data.name: CriticalSituationsForeseen
data.value: Are critical situations foreseen?

data.name: CriticalResponsesSpecified
data.value: Have critical responses been specified?

data.name: FailurePreventionDefined
data.value: Is there a way to prevent failures?

data.name: FailureEffectsMinimized
data.value: Has there been a way to minimize the effects of failures?

data.name: UserFaultToleranceLevelSpecified
data.value: Is the required level of user fault tolerance specified?

data.name: UserErrorMinimizationMeasures
data.value: Are there measures in place to minimize the possibility of user error?

data.name: DataVerificationMethods
data.value: Are there any specific methods for verifying your data?

data.name: DataRepairMethods
data.value: Are there any specific ways to repair the data?

data.name: ProcessingResultsVerification
data.value: Are there any ways to verify the processing results?

data.name: ProcessingErrorsHandling
data.value: Are there any ways to deal with processing errors?

data.name: SystemThreatsToUsersIdentified
data.value: Have you identified threats from the system to the user?

data.name: RiskAssessmentPerformed
data.value: Has the risk been assessed in this aspect?

data.name: SecurityMeasuresDefined
data.value: Are there any security measures in this aspect?

data.name: SystemThreatsToOtherSystemsIdentified
data.value: Have system threats to other systems been identified?

data.name: UserThreatsToSystemIdentified
data.value: Have threats to the system been identified from users?

data.name: OtherSystemThreatsToSystemIdentified
data.value: Have you identified threats to your system from other systems?

data.name: InputDataVerification
data.value: Is there a verification of input data?

data.name: OutputVerification
data.value: Is there a verification of the output?

data.name: StoredDataPreview
data.value: Is it possible to view the stored data?

data.name: StoredDataVerification
data.value: Is it possible to verify the stored data?

data.name: ControlProceduresDefined
data.value: Are there any control procedures?

data.name: TestProceduresDefined
data.value: Are there any test procedures?

data.value: Is there a hardware platform on which the system will run?

data.value: Is it possible to run on different hardware platforms?

data.value: Is there a specific operating system on which the system will run?

data.name: DifferentOperatingSystemsSupported
data.value: Is it possible to run on different operating systems?

data.value: Are import file formats specified?

data.name: ExportFileFormatsSpecified
data.value: Are there any export file formats specified?

data.name: DatabaseSystemsSpecified
data.value: Are acceptable (different) database systems specified?

data.value: Is there a change in the number format?

data.value: Is there a change in the currency symbol and its position?

data.value: Is there a change in quotation marks?

data.value: Is the macro (script) language specified?

data.value: Is there a specific language for writing add-ons?

data.value: Is there an interface for add-ons?

data.name: FileFormatChoiceSupported
data.value: Is there a choice of file format?

data.name: DatabaseSystemChangeSupported
data.value: Is there a possibility to change the database system?

data.name: WindowLayoutChangeSupported
data.value: Is it possible to change the layout of the windows?

data.name: WindowAppearanceChangeSupported
data.value: Is it possible to change the appearance of windows?

data.name: UserProfileChoiceSupported
data.value: Is there a possibility to choose a user profile?

data.name: MenuConfigurationSupported
data.value: Is there a way to configure menus?

data.name: ToolbarConfigurationSupported
data.value: Is there a way to configure toolbars?

data.value: Is there a way to configure keyboard shortcuts?

data.value: Is there a system architecture configuration to be adjusted during installation?

data.name: PostInstallationConfigurationSupported
data.value: Is there a system architecture configuration adjustment after installation?

data.name: GoalsAdequateToProblems
data.value: Are the goals adequate to the problems?

data.name: GoalsAdequateToBenefits
data.value: Are the goals adequate to the benefits?

data.name: FeaturesFitForPurpose
data.value: Are the features fit for purpose?

data.value: Have the requirements been evaluated by the customer? How high?

data.name: RequirementsEvaluatedByUsers
data.value: Have the requirements been evaluated by future users? How high?

data.value: Have the requirements been assessed by the contractors? How high?

data.value: Is the implemented interface compliant with the standards?

data.name: ExpectedWayOfWorkingStandardsCompliance
data.value: Is the expected way of working up to standards?

data.value: Are there any hints for the user?

data.value: Are there explanations for inexperienced users?

data.value: Is there a system of assistance?

data.value: Is autofill provided?

data.value: Is there an autocorrect?

data.value: Has the scope of the aid scheme been defined?

data.value: Is the scope of the hint system specified?

data.value: Is there any technical support for the user?

data.value: Is the expected way of working consistent with the current way of working?

data.value: Is it planned to produce a demo version?

data.value: Are there any plans to produce teaching programs?

data.value: Are training courses planned?

data.value: Is there a possibility of recording and repeating a sequence of commands?

data.value: Are there hints?

data.value: Are there any means of autocorrection or autocompletion?

data.value: Have keyboard shortcuts been implemented?

data.value: Have you implemented the appropriate mouse functionality?

data.value: Are the requirements consistent with the goals?

data.value: Are the required features internally consistent?

data.value: Are functional requirements not in conflict with performance requirements?

data.value: Are performance requirements not in conflict with credibility requirements?

data.value: Is the use of synonyms and abbreviations limited?

data.value: Have functional requirements been linked to non-functional ones?

data.value: How were performance and reliability requirements reconciled?

data.value: How are performance requirements reconciled with the required flexibility?

data.name: FunctionImplementationUnderstandable
data.value: Is the way the function is implemented understandable?

data.name: InterfaceSetupFacilitatesUnderstanding
data.value: Does the way the interface is set up make it easier to understand the functionality?

data.name: ImplementationModular
data.value: Was the implementation done in a modular way?

data.name: ModuleDependenciesAppropriate
data.value: Are the dependencies between modules appropriate?

data.name: ExecutionModulesUsed
data.value: Are execution modules used?

data.name: ExecutionModuleDivisionAppropriate
data.value: Is the division into executive modules appropriate?

data.name: ExecutionModuleDependenciesAppropriate
data.value: Are the dependencies between the execution modules appropriate?

data.name: SourceCodeAvailable
data.value: Is the source code available?

data.name: SourceCodeConsistentWithDocumentation
data.value: Is the source code consistent with the documentation?

data.name: SourceCodeFormattedToStandards
data.value: Is the source code formatted according to standards?

data.name: SourceCodeUnderstandable
data.value: Is the source code understandable?

data.name: ImplementationLinkedToProject
data.value: Is the implementation linked to the project?

data.name: ImplementationLinkedToRequirements
data.value: Is the implementation linked to the requirements specification?

data.name: ImplementedFunctionsInterconnected
data.value: Have the implemented functions been properly interconnected?

data.name: FunctionalImplementationsLinked
data.value: Have functional implementations been linked to functional implementations?

data.name: FunctionalImplementationsInterrelated
data.value: Are the functional implementations interrelated?

data.name: InputOutputConditionsSpecified
data.value: Are the input and output conditions of the operation specified

data.name: ProcessInputOutputConditionsSpecified
data.value: Have the input and output conditions of the processes been specified?

data.name: EmergencyTestingPossible
data.value: Is there a specific way to test for emergencies?

data.name: CriticalSituationTestingPossible
data.value: Is it possible to test critical situations?

data.name: EmergencySituationTestingPossible
data.value: Is it possible to test emergency situations?

data.name: UserInterfaceRequirementsStandardCompliance
data.value: Have requirements been defined for interface compliance with standards?
